episodes.title: Shima no Otakara no Yukue! Zenny Kaizokudan Shutsugeki!
episodes.description: The Marines are defeated and Zenny prepares to begin his new life as a pirate.

episodes.title: Niji-iro no Kiri Densetsu! Ruluka Tou no Roujin Henzo
episodes.description: The gang lands in Ruluka island, where they meet old professor Henzo and his lifetime studies about the Rainbow Mist. Sanji fights the son of current mayor Wetton.

episodes.title: Eien no Kuni no Juunin! Pumpkin Kaizokudan!
episodes.description: Luffy, Zoro, Ussop, Nico and Professor Henzo enter the Rainbow Mist where they find the Pumpkin Pirates. Meanwhile, Nami, Chopper and Sanji find out that the Going Merry is gone and decide to go after it.

episodes.title: Furusato e no Omoi! Dasshutsu Funou no Kaizoku Hakaba!
episodes.description: Henzo makes friends with the Pumpkin Pirates but Rapanui remains distrustful. Luffy and friends try to find the way out from the Rainbow Mist while Nami sails to help them. Sanji and Chopper prepare to fight Wetton's people.

episodes.title: Ransen Hisshi! Wetton no Yabou to Niji no Tou
episodes.description: Whetton has the large tower in the city fall into the Rainbow Mist, creating a bridge that connects both worlds. He and his men then cross the bridge to take the treasures inside.

episodes.title: Soshite Densetsu ga Hajimaru! Iza Niji no Kanata e
episodes.description: The end of Whetton's tax run.

episodes.title: Ubawareta Log! Salvage-ou Mashira!
episodes.description: In order to find the way to the mythical sky island, Skypiea, the Straw Hat Pirates must explore a sunken ship, working around the King of Salvagers, Masira, as well as the dangerous beasts of the deep.

episodes.title: Kaibutsu Toujou! Shirohige Ichimi ni wa Te o Dasuna
episodes.description: As if escaping the jaws of a giant sea turtle and dealing with an infuriated Masira weren't enough, the crew also has to contend with monsters that reach up to the sky and blot out the sun. In the meantime, Buggy and his crew have to put up with Portgas D. Ace, second in command to the dangerous Whitebeard!

episodes.title: Yume o Miruna! Azakeri no Machi Mock Town!
episodes.description: The Straw Hat Crew arrives to Jaya and Luffy, Zoro and Nami walk into town to find information about the Sky Island, but on the way they meet $55,000,000-reward pirate Bellamy who mocks about their quest.

episodes.title: Kaizoku no Takami! Yume o Kataru Otoko to Kaitei Tansaku Ou
episodes.description: Luffy and Zoro are beaten by Bellamy so they and Nami go back to the ship. Robin finds information about the Sky Island and the crew departs, but they are confronted with pirate Shojo.

episodes.title: Densetsu no Ichizoku! "Usotsuki Norland"
episodes.description: Luffy and his friends meet Cricket Montblanc, the great-great-grandchild of Norland the Lier, and he tells them the story about the City of Gold.

episodes.title: Kumo Kaji Ippai! Southbird o Oe!
episodes.description: The crew is ordered by Cricket to find a Southbird, because otherwise they will not be able to orient in the open sea. Bellamy arrives at the diver's house.

episodes.title: Yume wa Kanawanai!? Bellamy VS Saruyama Rengou
episodes.description: Bellamy steals the Sarumaya Alliance gold while the crew is hunting a Southbird. Luffy goes after Bellamy.

episodes.title: Ichioku no Otoko! Sekai Saikou Kenryoku to Kaizoku Kurohige
episodes.description: Luffy defeats Bellamy and recovers Cricket's gold.

episodes.title: Fune wa Sora o Yuku! Knock-Up Stream ni Nore
episodes.description: The Gold Merry is repaired and the crew sails to meet the Knock Up Stream and find the Sky Island. Blackbeard goes after Luffy.

episodes.title: Koko wa Sora no Umi! Sora no Kishi to Tengoku no Mon
episodes.description: Wandering through the Sea of the Sky, the crew meets Gan Fall, the Knight of the Sky. He saves them from the attack of a treasure hunter. Later, they find the way up to the White White Sea.

episodes.title: Kami no Kuni Skypiea! Kumo no Nagisa no Tenshi-tachi
episodes.description: The Straw Hat Crew arrives to Skypiea, where they meet angels Conis and her father Pagaya. Nami gets lost while trying to drive the Waver.

episodes.title: Kindan no Seichi! Kami no Sumu Shima to Ten no Sabaki!
episodes.description: Nami meets some mysterious warriors in the Forbidden Island while Pagaya tries to repair the old Waver the crew found in the Lower World. The White Berets go after the pirates for their illegal entry into Skypiea.

episodes.title: Hayaku mo Hanzaisha!? Skypiea no Hou no Bannin
episodes.description: The White Berets try to force the crew to pay the fee while Nami is returning from the Forbidden Island. They fight and defeat the Berets and become class 2 criminals.

episodes.title: Dasshutsu Naru ka!? Ugokihajimeta Kami no Shiren!
episodes.description: While the crew is preparing to leave Skypiea, Luffy, Ussop and Sanji go back to Pagaya's house seeking food and materials. The ship is trapped by a giant crab, and carried to the Upper Yard.

episodes.title: Lovely-doori no Wana! Zennounaru God Enel
episodes.description: Conis reveals her true intentions and Enel unleashes his rage. Luffy, Sanji and Usopp sail towards the Upper Yard.

episodes.title: Susume Karasumaru! Ikenie no Saidan o Mezase
episodes.description: Luffy, Sanji and Usopp sail along the Milky Road and face different kinds of traps. The rest of the crew is caught at the Sacrificial Altar, where Chopper repairs the Going Merry while Robin, Zoro and Nami go into the sacred jungle.

episodes.title: Seizonritsu 10%! Mantra-tsukai no Shinkan Satori!
episodes.description: Luffy, Sanji and Usopp meet Priest Satori and his balls. The crow boat is lost and the crew must defeat Satori and find the boat before it is too late.

episodes.title: "Tama no Shiren" no Kyoui! Mayoi no Mori no Shitou
episodes.description: Robin finds a trail hidden under the moss, while one of the Sacred Priests visits Chopper at the Altar. The fight against Satori continues.

episodes.title: Choppa no Kiki! Moto Kami to Shura Shinkan no Tatakai
episodes.description: Chopper, threatened by priest Shura, blows the whistle for Gan Fall to come, but before he can arrive, Priest Shura assaults Chopper and begins destroying the Going Merry.

episodes.title: Shinpi no Fukami! Ito no Shiren to Ai no Shiren?!?
episodes.description: Gan Fall cannot handle Shura and lost the battle. Meanwhile, Satori is finally defeated by Luffy and Sanji.

episodes.title: Shandora no Hi wo Tomose! Senshi Wyper no Tatakai!
episodes.description: Chopper is saved by a bunch of giant Southbirds, who tell him that Gan Fall was actually God. Nami, Zoro and Robin discover the reason why Upper Yard is a soil island: It was once part of Jaya, and this is the part that Liar Noland saw. Meanwhile the Shandia attack Upper Yard.

episodes.title: Sora no gon no Machi Jaya! Kami no Miya e Susume!
episodes.description: The Shandia attack on Upper Yard has started. The crew is finally reunited, and everyone speaks up about what has happened. Chopper takes care of Gan Fall, and the pirates plan to steal the gold on the island.

episodes.title: gon Sagashi Zenya no Matsuri! "Vearth" e no Omoi!
episodes.description: After befriending a wolf pack, Gan Fall tells the crew a little more about the history of Upper Yard.

episodes.title: Kami Eneru ni Hairu! Ikinokotta Mono e no Wakare!
episodes.description: Enel takes away the limitations of the priests. Also, Usopp witnesses a mysterious person fixing the ship; the next day Merry is found to be back to her original form. After getting her off the altar, the pirates plan out their course of action.

episodes.title: Kibamuku Uwabami! Tsui ni Hajimaru Survival Game
episodes.description: Gan Fall tells the story about the raising of Enel's tyranny, and the vengeance of the Shandian people. Luffy, Zoro, Chopper and Robin escape from a poisonous python.

episodes.title: Sutemi no Haigeki! Senki Wiper no Kakugo
episodes.description: The Survival Game begins and Shura is the first to fall. The Shandians split and Wyper meets Luffy. Enel sends the 50 Sacred Warriors. Gan Fall teaches Sanji, Nami, Usopp and Chopper about the power of the Reject Dial.

episodes.title: Kuuchuu no Gekisen! Kaizoku Zoro VS Senshi Braham
episodes.description: Robin makes it to the ruins and fights against a Sacred Warrior. Zoro faces the lightguns of Braham, while Luffy is still entertained with Wiper. Enel comes into scene.

episodes.title: Unaru Burn Bazooka!! Luffy VS Senki Wiper
episodes.description: Satori's younger brothers appear to fight against Nami and Gan Fall. Luffy is swallowed by the giant python. Chopper meets the Iron Priest.

episodes.title: Numa no Shiren! Chopper VS Shinkan Gedatsu!!
episodes.description: Luffy is still trapped into the python, while Robin tries to protect the ruins she found from the powerful attacks of Chief Yama. Chopper must face his fears in order to defeat Priest Gedatsu.

episodes.title: Muteki no Nouryoku! Akasareru Enel no Shoutai
episodes.description: The Survival Game continues, Gan Fall and Nami defeat Zatori's younger brothers Hotori and Kotori. The former god goes after Enel and Nami is left with his Impact Dial. Conis and Pagaya make it to the Going Merry.

episodes.title: Maburoshi no Miyako! Yuudai Naru Shandra no Iseki!!
episodes.description: Robin defeats Chief Yama and arrives to the city of Shandora. Zoro makes a new friend. Luffy is starving but still inside the python.

episodes.title: Seizonritsu 0%!! Chopper VS Shinkan Ohm
episodes.description: Chopper tries to escape from Priest Ohm. Nami and Aisa gets lost in the forest after the giant python spots the Going Merry. Zoro, Gan Fall and Wiper meet Priest Ohm and prepare for the battle.

episodes.title: Giant Jack o Nobore!! Jouzou Iseki no Shitou
episodes.description: Nami and Aisa arrive to the Upper Ruins when escaping from the python, where the fight between Zoro, Gan Fall, Ohm and Wiper continues. Zoro finds Chopper, and goes mad. Gan Fall saves Nami and Aisa from Wiper's rage.

episodes.title: Tetsu no Shiren no Shinkoccyou! Shiruibara Death Match!!
episodes.description: Laki climbs to the Upper Ruins and meets Wiper. Enel appears and attacks her, then leaves. Nami, Gan Fall, Pierre and Aisa meet Luffy. Zoro tries to kill the python bur Ohm interferes.

episodes.title: Hotobashiru Zangeki! Zoro VS Shinkan Ohm!!
episodes.description: Fight between Zoro and Ohm continues while Luffy and Nami are still inside the python. Enel meets Robin in the Lower Ruins. One of the Gan Fall Guardians escapes and makes it to the beach where Conis and Pagaya are treating Sanji and Usopp.

episodes.title: Kuzure Yuku Jousou Iseki! Finale e no Quintet!!
episodes.description: Nami and Gan Fall come out of the python, which is rapidly terminated by Enel. The Survival Game's finale is approaching and there are still six survivors. Luffy and Aisa remain caught.

episodes.title: Kodai Iseki no Taiketsu! God Enel no Mokuteki!!
episodes.description: Enel reveals his intentions of returning to his birth land, Fairy Vearth. The 6th survivor is defeated and Enel invites the winners to come with him. Robin and Zoro face the strength of the God, but Wiper has a final strategy.

episodes.title: Fairy Vearth e no Yabou Hakobune Maxim!!
episodes.description: Enel's fierce is unleashed when the survivors try to resist him. Nami goes with Enel to Fairy Vearth so he takes her to the Maxim. Luffy, Aisa and Pierre come out of the python and find the beaten crew. Robin warns Luffy about Enel's intentions.

episodes.title: Tsuini Gekitotsu! Kaizoku Luffy VS God Enel!!
episodes.description: Conis arrives to Angel Island and prevents the people from Enel's plan. McKinley backs her and together they organize the exodus. Aisa guides Luffy to the cave where Enel and Nami are hidden. The battle begins.

episodes.title: Maxim Fujou! Ugoki Hajimeta Deathpiea!!
episodes.description: Enel prepares his final attack towards Angel Island. The people is gathering into the ships but some citizens decide to go to the shandian village and warn them. Luffy must overcome Enel's ability of Mantra.

episodes.title: Luffy Rakka! Kami no Sabaki to Nami no Nozomi!!
episodes.description: Luffy is trapped by a giant gold ball and falls from the Maxim ship. The shandians are informed about the danger. Sanji and Usopp leave the Going Merry to save Nami.

episodes.title: Mezameta Futari! Moeru Koi no Kyuushutsu Zensen
episodes.description: Sanji and Usopp prepare a plan to save Nami. Aisa and Pierre find Luffy and try to help him get rid of the golden ball. Meanwhile, in the Angel Island, people is rushing towards Cloud End.

episodes.title: Zetsubou e no Capriccio Semaei Kuru Sora Shima no Shoumetsu!!
episodes.description: The attack of Deathpeia begins while the Straw Hat Crew is gathering again at the foot of the Giant Jack. Thunders strike Angel Island. Luffy raises once more and runs to stop Enel.

episodes.title: Kane no Ne no Michibiki! Daisenshi to Tankenka no Monogatari
episodes.description: A flashback from Wyper about the history of Calgara and Norland. How Norland and his crew came to Calgara's village and saved the village from the epidemic.

episodes.title: Jubaku kara no Kaihou! Daisenshi ga Nagashita Namida!!
episodes.description: Norland and Calgara became best buddies, however, when the time almost came for Norland to go back to his kingdom, suddenly the villagers hate them.

episodes.title: Eien no Shinyuu! Oo-unabari ni Hibikuchikai no Kane!!
episodes.description: The cause of the hatred is discovered and explained. Meanwhile, Calgara vows to meet Noland again.

episodes.title: Angel-tou Shoumetsu! Raigou Kourin no Kyoufu!!
episodes.description: Wiper finds out from Niko Robin that Montblanc Noland has a descendant that is searching for the City of Gold, and that that is the reason why Luffy wants to ring the Golden Bell.

episodes.title: Giant Jack o Taose! Dasshutsu e no Saigo no Nozomi
episodes.description: Nami comes out with a good plan so that she and Luffy can reach Enel, by knocking down the Giant Jack. Zoro cuts the stalk, but Enel attacks him before he can cut the stalk once more. Robin tells Wyper that Luffy wants to ring the bell so that the descendant of Norland far below will hear it. Wyper then uses Reject to knock down Giant Jack.

episodes.title: Kami no Kune no Kiseki! Tenshi no Todoita Love Song
episodes.description: The battle reaches its climax as a powerful strike echoes across the sky, ringing the legendary Golden Bell.

episodes.title: Tatakai no Shuuen! Tooku Hibiku Hokori Takaki Fantasia
episodes.description: Hearing the sound of the Golden Bell, Montblanc Cricket and Masira brothers realize that all this time the Gold City is up in the sky. Meanwhile, Sky People (both Shandian and Skypiean) move to the Upper Yard since their homes are destroyed by Enel and celebrate the end of the 400-years-old war between them.

episodes.title: Ware Koko ni Itaru! Poneglyphs ga Tsumugu Mono
episodes.description: Robin notices the way to discover Rio Poneglyph after deciphering the Poneglyph on the Golden Bell. She also notices that Gol D. Roger wrote the Poneglyph and had discovered the Rio Poneglyph.

episodes.title: Iza Seikai e!! Omoi ga Orinasu Saishuu Gakushou
episodes.description: It's time for Straw Hat crew to continue their journey and go back to Blue Sea. The Golden Bell rings once again when they leave, as a parting gift and gratitude from Sky People. However, Straw Hat crew gets into a trouble when they land safely in Blue Sea.

episodes.title: Hijoujitai Hatsurei! Akumei Takaki Kaisokusen Sennyuu!
episodes.description: Things get a little messy at G-8 Marine base when a mysterious ship falls from the sky. Recognition ships are sent instantly. Meanwhile, the Straw Hat Crew has split and everyone is trying to understand the situation.

episodes.title: Ryourinin Sanji! Kaigun Shokudou de Shinka Hakki!
episodes.description: Sanji and Luffy are thought to be the famous brother chefs arriving from Mariejois. The cooking competition starts and Sanji shows his abilities while Luffy eats as much as he can. Zoro gets into trouble.

episodes.title: Torawareru Zoro to Chopper Kinkyuu Shittou
episodes.description: Zoro is interrogated by the marines but they do not believe his answers. Chopper helps Dr Kobato with her fear to blood, and together they heal the seriously injured marines.

episodes.title: Semaru Kaigun no Sousa mou! Torawareta Futari Me!
episodes.description: Luffy and Sanji are discovered in the kitchen but they manage to escape. Usopp is caught by Drake and taken with Zoro. Robin kidnaps the General Inspector.

episodes.title: Kesshi no Luffy to Sanji! Kyuushutsu Dai Sakusen!
episodes.description: Luffy and Sanji make it to the prison where Usopp and Zoro are caught but they are trapped by the marines. Usopp gives Sanji his Dials in order to destroy the cell.

episodes.title: Nekketsu Tokubetsu Butai Sansen! Bridge Koubousen!
episodes.description: Luffy, Usopp, Sanji and Zoro have to cross a huge bridge in order to get to dock 88. Marines are waiting and the battle begins. Dr Kobato helps Nami and Chopper to meet their friends.

episodes.title: Houi Mou Toppa! Dakkan Going Merry Gou
episodes.description: Nami and Dr Kobato pretend to be hostages and the crew makes it to the Going Merry, which Kobato's father Mekao has just set free. Robin takes a map of the fortress and meets them later.

episodes.title: Kieta Kaizokusen! Yousai Koubou Dai 2 Round
episodes.description: Luffy breaks the main gate redirecting the marine's bombs but Nami realizes the treasure is gone so the crew goes back into the docks. They hide the Going Merry and prepare for the assault.

episodes.title: Ougon Dakkan Sakusen to Waver Kaishuu Sakusen!
episodes.description: Nami and Sanji go after the Waver and Chopper takes care of the Going Merry. Meanwhile Luffy, Zoro, Usopp and Robin chase the treasure, but Vice Admiral Jonathan is expecting them.

episodes.title: Ichimoudajin Keikaku! Jonathan Jishin no Hisaku
episodes.description: The gold team opens the vault just to discover it's empty. The Waver team recovers the vehicle and meets Chopper at the dock. Luffy and Nami go to Jonathan's office to recover the gold, and the crew meets again in the ship.

episodes.title: Saraba Kaigun Yousai! Dasshutsu e no Saigo no Koubou
episodes.description: The teeth of Navarone close upon the Going Merry and the Straw Hat Crew thinks a plan to escape. Inspector Shepherd tries to attack the pirates on his own but he only causes more trouble.

episodes.title: Long Ring Long Land no Dai Bouken!
episodes.description: The crew is sailing the skies of Grand Line when the fire Dial runs out of gas. They arrive to a strange island where everything is longer than usual. Luffy meets an old man who lived 10 years wearing stilts.

episodes.title: Foxy Kaizoku Dan to Davy Back!
episodes.description: Tonjit and Shelly meet again and go riding along the fields when pirate Foxy appears and shoots a net to them. He defies Luffy to accept the Davy Back competition and the game begins.

episodes.title: Dai Ikkaisen! Gururi Isshuu Doughnut Race
episodes.description: The Donut Race begins where the pirates must form teams and navigate along the Long Ring Long Land shore. Evil captain Foxy prepares a trap for the Straw Hat Crew when they get to a whirlpool.

episodes.title: Gingitsune no Foxy! Mouretsu Bougai Kousei
episodes.description: Foxy's pirates win the Donut Race and take Chopper, who now can not participate in the second round. Sanji and Zoro must fight together against the powerful monkey brothers and a giant Fishman.

episodes.title: Dai 2 Kaisen! Buchi Kome Groggy Ring
episodes.description: The Groggy Ring game starts and Sanji and Zoro can't get on so well. Groggy Monster's Team takes advantage of the situation and beat the Straw Hat Pirates.

episodes.title: Red Card Renpatsu! Groggy Ring
episodes.description: The invincible Groggy Monsters are defeated by Sanji and Zoro and time has come for Luffy to choose a new nakama. Against his friend's advices, he chooses Tonjit's horse Shelly.

episodes.title: Dai Sankaisen! Guru Guru Roller Race!
episodes.description: The third game, Roller Race, begins and Luffy must learn how to roller skate before the Foxy team wins three rounds. Nami does her best but they are hypnotized by Porche.

episodes.title: Hakunetsu Bakusou Race! Saishuu Round Totsunyuu!
episodes.description: The Straw Hat team has balanced the competition but the final round is still to be won. Nami and Usopp develop a plan to stop Foxy but they are caught by his beam. Robin must help Luffy to win.

episodes.title: Unaru Netsukyuu Goukyuu! Kaizoku Dodgeball!
episodes.description: After Luffy's victory, he reclaims Chopper but foolishly accepts another challenge from Foxy.

episodes.title: Dangai no Kessen! Daruma-san ga Koronda!
episodes.description: Foxy sets his sights on a new crewmate from Luffy's team. The next match is a race to the top of the island.

episodes.title: Captain Taiketsu! Saishuusen Combat!
episodes.description: After losing two nakamas, Nami doubles the bet and the last round of the Davy Back fight starts. Luffy and Foxy battle in the Sexy Foxy ship, where the evil Foxy's beams are putting Luffy in a hurry.

episodes.title: Zenkai Noro Noro Kougeki VS Fujimi no Luffy
episodes.description: Foxy carries Luffy into his ship where he has the advantage. Several rooms with dangerous weapons are waiting for him, and the Noro Noro beam keeps our hero frozen.

episodes.title: Souzetsu Nettou Combat! Unmei no Saishuu Kecchaku
episodes.description: Luffy defeats Foxy using a piece of mirror that got stuck in his afro and wins the Davy Back Fight. 500 nakamas come into his crew among which he gets Robin and Chopper back. Old Oni meets his grandson the digger.

episodes.title: Ushinatta? Ubawareta? Omae wa Dare Da?
episodes.description: After leaving Long Ring Long Land, the crew drops the anchor in an unknown island to spend the night. They are visited by a mysterious boy who plays a song, and everybody wakes up without their memories, except Robin.

episodes.title: Fue o Idaita Nazo no Shounen to Robin no Suiri!
episodes.description: Robin is the only one who has her memories untouched and she must keep the crew together. Nami and Zoro leave on their own but the archaeologist manages to convince the rest. The mysterious guilty boy appears.

episodes.title: Iza Kioku o Dakkan Seyo! Kaizoku Dan Shima ni Jouriku
episodes.description: Luffy and his crew confronts the Mysterious Boy but he escapes after giving Luffy's memories back. The crew goes after his lost friends but the Boy has some plans for Zoro. Robin begins to unravel the mystery.

episodes.title: Kiba o Muku Zoro! Tachihadakatta Yajuu!
episodes.description: Robin discovers the secret of the memories-eating monster and goes after him with Sanji, Chopper, Usopp, Luffy and Nami, whose gold Sanji is carrying. Zoro comes looking for Luffy and the battle begins.

episodes.title: Honjou o Awarashita Kioku Dorobou no Saigo Gyakushuu
episodes.description: The Seahorse and the boy confront the crew but Sanji kick's the boy's ass just when he is trying to attack Nami and Usopp. Memories come back and the battle begins. Luffy is the only one who can fight without memories.

episodes.title: Hokori takaki otoko! Gin Gitsune no Foxy
episodes.description: The Straw Hat Crew find Foxy in the sea and help him get to his ship. Luffy fights against the pirates that are trying to steal the Sexy Foxy and defeats them, just to discover that Foxy has been planning treason.

episodes.title: Mottomo Muteki ni Tsuyoi Yatsu? Tomottomo Kiken na Otoko!
episodes.description: After being defeated again, Foxy keeps trying to disturb and the crew surprises him using a crab robot. Luffy and friends land in a new island where they find a powerful marine leader, Aokiji.

episodes.title: Kaigun Honbu Taishou Aokiji! Saikou Senryoku no Kyoui
episodes.description: The Straw Hats encounter a laid-back but formidable Marine admiral who showcases a chilling power. As tensions rise, Luffy, Sanji, and Zoro step in, but the battle quickly proves to be an uphill struggle.

episodes.title: Gomu to Koori no Ikkiuchi! Luffy vs Aokiji
episodes.description: Luffy tells the crew to protect Robin and leave him alone with Aokiji. Ice and Rubber face each other but the Straw Hat captain is defeated. Sanji and Zoro save him and the Going Merry continues it's voyage.

episodes.title: Shissou Umi Ressha to Mizu no Toshi Water Seven
episodes.description: The Straw Hat Crew arrives to a Blue Station where they meet the great Sea Train. Old guard Kokoro tells them about Water 7 and they sail to the island looking for a carpenter to repair the Going Merry.

episodes.title: Suijou Toshi no Bouken! Mokushise Kyodai Zousen Koujou
episodes.description: Luffy, Nami and Usopp go with the gold looking for exchange and the shipyards where they can repair their ship. Chopper finally finds a library but Robin disappears. Zoro receives some visits in the Going Merry.

episodes.title: Franky ikka to Iceberg san!
episodes.description: Zoro gets rid of the Franky Family, while Sanji gets lost in the city and watches Robin disappear with a masked man. Luffy, Nami and Usopp meet carpenter Kaku and Mayor Iceberg. The Franky Family steals their money.

episodes.title: Garera Company! Soukan Ichiban Dock
episodes.description: The Franky Family is still after the money while Zoro talks with Kaku about the Going Merry. When Kaku returns to the shipyard with the terrible news, Luffy and Nami realizes that Usopp is gone.

episodes.title: Kaizoku Yuukai Jiken to Shi o Matsu Dake no Kaizokusen
episodes.description: Usopp is kidnapped by the Franky Family. Nami and Luffy realize and Luffy goes after him. The rest of the crew is receiving the new about Merry. Usopp confront the burglars at the Franky House.

episodes.title: Nakama Kyuushutsu! Harikomi Franky House
episodes.description: The Straw Hat Crew arrives to the Franky House looking for their friend and they easily beat the Franky Famlily, but their boss has already escaped with the money. Chopper heal Usopp while Luffy makes a decision.

episodes.title: Gekka no Oogenka! Kanashimi ni Hirugaeru Kaizokuki!
episodes.description: Usopp is healed by Chopper and he asks for the Going Merry's future. A worrying quarrel begins when Luffy tells him his decision. He and Usopp argue until the Lier leaves the ship and asks Luffy for a duel.

episodes.title: Luffy VS Usopp! Butsukaru Otoko no Iji
episodes.description: The most terrible fight begins and Usopp has prepared some tricks to fool Luffy, but the strength of the captain is clear. Memories go back and forth while even Merry is crying.

episodes.title: Genkishin Mizu no Toshi! Nerawareta Iceberg
episodes.description: The crew has moved to a hotel when Nami arrives with the news about Iceburg. She and Luffy go to find out more while Sanji and Chopper keep tracing Robin. In dock 1, Franki appears looking for Luffy.

episodes.title: Gomu Gomu Ningen VS Ka o Fuku Cyborg
episodes.description: Franky wants to fight Luffy but in the meantime Iceburg awakes and tell the carpenters what he saw. The Galle-La five go after Luffy and they interrupt the fight. Aqua Laguna is coming.

episodes.title: Hannin wa Mugiwara Kaizukudan? Mizu no Toshi Youjinbou
episodes.description: Franky interferes in the battle and Nami and Luffy escape. The city is looking for the Straw Hat Pirates when Luffy rushes into Iceburg's residence, trying to find the truth. Iceburg confirms Robin's guilt.

episodes.title: Eien no Wakare? Yamo o Hiku Onna Nico Robin
episodes.description: The crew is spread throughout the city, Sanji and Chopper go back to the ship to warn Usopp about the Aqua Laguna. Chopper smells Robin and she declares her farewell.

episodes.title: Robin o Tsukamaero! Mugiwara Ichimi no Ketsui
episodes.description: The crew decides to go after Robin and determine once and for all whether she is their nakama or not. People of Water 7 gather in Iceburg's residence to protect him during the arrival of Aqua Laguna.

episodes.title: Aizu wa Hougeki to Tomoni! Ugokidashita CP9
episodes.description: Night has fallen and the Galley-La soldiers are waiting. CP9 spies appear while the Straw Hat Crew is patiently waiting hidden in a tree. Iceburg tries to protect his treasure, but it's too late. Battle has began.

episodes.title: Kamen o Totta CP9! Sono Odoroki no Sugao
episodes.description: Luffy decides to start moving but he gets stuck between two buildings. The rest of the crew makes it to the back garden where they are forced to beat the shipwrights. CP9's identities are unmasked in front of Iceburg's eyes.

episodes.title: Himeta Kizuna! Iceberg to Franky
episodes.description: CP9 members untangle Iceburg's plan to maintain Pluton's whereabouts in secret and decide to go after Franky. Meanwhile, both Luffy and Pauly, and Nami, Zoro and Chopper arrive to Iceburg's room.

episodes.title: Kaete Koi Robin! CP9 to no Taiketsu!
episodes.description: The CP9 members show their true strength when the Straw Hat Pirates decide to attack. Neither Luffy nor Zoro manage to beat them. There are 2 minutes left for the huge fire and Robin escapes once again.

episodes.title: Mugiwara Kaizoku Dan Zenmetsu? Model Leopard no Kyoui
episodes.description: The Galley-La company main building is set on fire and the CP9 members go after Franky, who is trying to make friends with Usopp. Aqua Laguna has arrived and both Luffy and Zoro have been thrown to the water.

episodes.title: Fune kara mo Aisareta Otoko! Usopp no Namida!
episodes.description: Franky shows Usopp how inevitable the perish of the Going Merry is and the mysteries about the man who repaired the ship in Skypeia are revealed. The CP9 agents arrive to Franky's hidden warehouse.

episodes.title: Franky no Kako! Umi ressha ga Hashitta Hi
episodes.description: CP9 agents discover an antique room in the warehouse. Memories awake while Franky tries to stop them before everything is destroyed: Tom's prosecution and the Umi Ressha's first trip.

episodes.title: Spandum no Inbou! Umi Ressha ga Yureta Hi
episodes.description: Goverment CP5 agent Spandam frames Tom so he can freely investigate him and find Pluton's blueprints. The Fishman hands the plans to his apprentices and the beginning of Iceburg and Franky's enmity is revealed.

episodes.title: Densetsu no Otoko no Saigo! Umi Ressha ga Naita Hi
episodes.description: Tom decides not to fight against the government and accepts to go to Eines Lobby in exchange of the exoneration of Iceburg and Franky. Franky can't bear the guilt and attacks Spandam, who is now CP9 boss.

episodes.title: Uragiri no Shinsou! Robin no Kanashiki Ketsui!
episodes.description: The CP9 agents take Frany and Usopp and prepare the last-minute departure of the Umi Ressha. Meanwhile, Chopper rescues Pauly and Iceburg, who tells Nami the truth about Robin. Sanji's plan comes into action.

episodes.title: Nakama o Hikihanasu Kiteki! Hashiridasu Umi Ressha
episodes.description: Chopper goes to search the city looking for Luffy and Zoro while Nami rushes to the train station. The Umi Ressha departs earlier than expected due to the Aqua Laguna and Sanji decides to sneak in.

episodes.title: Sanji Totsunyuu! Arashi no Naka no Umiressha Battle!
episodes.description: Sanji is spotted by the agents in the last wagon and forced to fight. The Aqua Laguna is arriving and Pauly prevents Nami from drowning. She goes looking for Luffy and find him stuck between two walls.

episodes.title: Nami Tamashii no Sakebi! Mugiwara no Luffy Fukkatsu!
episodes.description: Nami and Chopper find Luffy and Zoro and struggle to rescue them. Zoro recovers his Sandai Kitetsu and breaks the chimney, while Luffy tears two buildings apart. The crew is gathered and Nami reveals the truth about Robin.

episodes.title: Mou Hitotsu no Umi Ressha! Rocketman Shutsugeki
episodes.description: The Straw Hat Crew goes to an abandoned warehouse where old Kokoro shows them another train, the Rocket Man. They find Iceburg, who has been setting it up, and depart to chase the Umi Ressha.

episodes.title: Nakama o Sukue! Tekidoushi ga Musunda Chikai no Kizuna!
episodes.description: The Franky Family joins the Straw Hat pirates when the Rocket Man is leaving the city, and in the way Pauly and two more shipwrights appear in the train. Tree teams must work together to defeat CP9.

episodes.title: Nami o Kudake! Luffy to Zoro no Saikyou Combo
episodes.description: In order to avoid the dangerous wave that's coming ahead, Luffy and Zoro join their forces. Sanji and Franky are decided to go after Robin but Usopp considers that it's not his duty. In exchange, a mysterious hero appears.

episodes.title: Nazo no Otoko Toujou!? Sono Na wa Sogeking!
episodes.description: Sanji, Franky and mysterious Sogeking mock T-Bone and his men and release their wagon, leaving them behind. The friends meet master Okama Kempo and Sanji bid them to move forward.

episodes.title: Kokku Taiketsu! Sanji vs Ramen Kenpou
episodes.description: Sanji is forced to use his hands in the battle against chef Ramen Kempo, who has build himself a noodle armor. The Straw Hat chef uses knifes in order to defeat him.

episodes.title: Yane no Ue no Kettou! Franky VS Nero
episodes.description: Cybor man Franky is in danger when new CP9 agent Nero discovers his weak point. He adopts a centaur shape and beats him against the train's roof.

episodes.title: Gekitotsu! Onigiri Zoro VS Funekiri T-Bone
episodes.description: The Rocket Man and his people spots a halved Sea King and Zoro decides to fight against the responsible. T-Bone is running through Umi Ressha rails towards Puffing Tom when he sees the light coming towards him.

episodes.title: Robin Soudatsusen! Sogeking no Kisaku!!
episodes.description: The Rocket Man meet a strange toad in the middle of the road, while Sanji, Franky and Sogeking manage to take Robin and split the wagons. Robin insists upon going to Enies Lobby but Sanji begs her to return with the crew.

episodes.title: Shihou no shima! Enies Lobby!
episodes.description: The Rocket Man train is diverted from the rails due to Yokozuna's rage but old Kokoro calms him and the Kaeru joins the crew. Franky Family finds Sanji and Sogeking. Puffing Tom arrives to Enies Lobby.

episodes.title: Jouriku Sakusen Shidou! Mugiwara Ichimi Totsunyuu Seyo!
episodes.description: The Straw Hat pirates, Franky Family, Galley-La shipwrights and Sogeking prepare their strategy to land in Enies Lobby, but Luffy can't wait and rushes on his own. The battles commences sooner than expected.

episodes.title: Luffy Kaishingeki! Shihou no Shima de Daikessen!!
episodes.description: The Franky Family along with the shipwrights manage to open the first gate and make it to the main entrance though two brother giants, Oimo and Kashi, stop them. The Straw Hat crew is waiting and Luffy has an army in front of him.

episodes.title: Kyojinzoku to no Koubou! Daini no Tobira o Akero!
episodes.description: Kashi the giant is defeated when the King Bulls arrive to the main entrance and only Oimo is left. Luffy avoids unnecessary fight with the marines and heads to the Headquarters. The Straw Hat crew's time has come.

episodes.title: Katsuro o Hirake! Sora o Tobu Rocketman!
episodes.description: The main team has arrived. Bending the outside fence of the island inward, Rocketman uses it as a ramp and flies through the first and second gates.

episodes.title: Luffy ni Oitsuke! Mugiwara Ichimi Souryokusen
episodes.description: Straw Hat Pirates and ally engage into battles everywhere on the main island while they are trying to catch up with Luffy.

episodes.title: Uragirareta Robin! Sekai Seifu no Omowaku!
episodes.description: Spandam plans on taking the Straw Hat Pirates prisoner despite his agreement with Robin to leave Straw Hat Pirates alone if she surrenders herself to the government.

episodes.title: Robin o Kaese! Luffy VS Blueno!
episodes.description: Luffy slingshots himself to the top part of the courthouse, where Blueno stands waiting for him.

episodes.title: Tachidomaru na! Hangeki no Noroshi o Agero!
episodes.description: Luffy fights against Blueno in the Palace's roof while the Straw Hat Crew receives help from Sogeking and the giants. CP9 agents Kaku and Califa are congratulated with two Akuma No Mi.

episodes.title: Luffy Mokuzen! Saibanshomae Hiroba e Shuuketsu se yo
episodes.description: The Straw Hat Crew arrives to the foot of the main gate, on the roof of which Luffy is fighting with Blueno. In order to protect his nakama, the captain unravels new amazing abilities.

episodes.title: Subete wa Nakama wo Mamoru Tame ni! Gear Second Hatsudou
episodes.description: Nami, Zoro, Chopper and Sanji are approaching the main island's limit and the Franky crew must pull down the levers of the bridge. Luffy demonstrates his strength and Robin hears him approach.

episodes.title: Kotaero Robin! Mugiwara Ichimi no Sakebi!!
episodes.description: Zoro gets lost in the palace and decides to open a hole in the ceiling. His attack draws Nami and Chopper with it and together they get to the roof. Sanji kicks his way up and Sogeking is thrown by Kashi. The gang reunites again.

episodes.title: Robin no Kako! Akuma to Yoba re ta Shoujo!
episodes.description: CP9 boss Spandam threatens Robin with the Buster Call and her sorrowful memories arise. As a girl, always disrespected by her people, she met Saul the giant, who awakes laugh in her. 4 days later, a mysterious visit arrives.

episodes.title: Shukumei no Oyako! Sono Haha no Na wa Olvia!
episodes.description: Saul realizes he knows Robin's mother and warns her about the imminent danger. Olvia talks to the archaeologists and goes after 20-year-ago CP9 captain. The world government sets the ancient library on fire and Saul runs to take Robin with him.

episodes.title: Ohara no Higeki! Buster Call no Kyoufu
episodes.description: The Ohara archaeologists tell their theory about what they think that happened during the Lost Century. The Buster Call is summoned and the Tree of Knowledge is set on fire. Robin is rescued by Saul, the ex vice admiral.

episodes.title: Ikitai to Ie! Oretachi wa Nakama Da!!
episodes.description: Since she was 8, Robin's life has been a constant struggle to survive. Everybody has told her that her existence was a crime, and now Luffy begs her to stay alive.

episodes.title: Taki ni Mukatte Tobe!! Luffy no Omoi!!
episodes.description: A summary of Luffy's backstory.

episodes.title: Otoko no Ikizama! Zoro no Waza, Usopp no Yume
episodes.description: A summary of Zoro and Usopp's backstory.

episodes.title: Namida ga Tsumuida Nakama no Kizuna! Nami no Sekai Chizu
episodes.description: A summary of Nami's backstory.

episodes.title: Wakare ga Otoko o Migaku! Sanji to Chopper
episodes.description: A summary of Sanji and Chopper's backstory.

episodes.title: Subete wa Nakama no Tame ni! Yami no Naka no Robin!
episodes.description: A summary of Robin's backstory, as well as the reasons of her recent actions.

episodes.title: Sekkeizu wa Watasanai! Franky no Ketsudan
episodes.description: Franky decides to burn the blueprint he holds all this time in front of Spandam. Straw Hat Pirates crosses into the Tower of Law with Rocketman.

episodes.title: Itsutsu no Kagi o Ubae! Mugiwara Ichimi Tai CP9
episodes.description: The key to open the seastone handcuff on Robin is owned by 5 members of CP9. Thus, each Straw Hat Pirate and Franky engages themselves into battle against CP9. Meanwhile, Spandam and Lucci takes Robin to Gates of Justice through a secret passage.

episodes.title: Akuma no Mi no Chikara! Kaku to Jabra Daihenshin
episodes.description: Zoro encounters Kaku, while Usopp tries to steal a key from sleeping Jabura. Both are the user of Zoan-type devil fruits, enable Kaku turns into a giraffe and Jabura turns into a wolf.

episodes.title: Shinde mo Keran! Sanji Otoko no Kishidou!
episodes.description: Sanji encounters Kalifa, and because of his vow to rather die than kick a woman, he is defeated easily. Seeing Sanji being defeated and in a horrible condition, Nami decides to take over and fights against Kalifa.

episodes.title: Fukurou no Gosan! Ore no Cola wa Inochi no Mizu!
episodes.description: Franky gets into a fist fight with Fukuro.

episodes.title: Zoro Shinwaza Sakuretsu! Katana no Na wa Sogeking?
episodes.description: Accidentally, Zoro and Usopp get handcuffed together and neither Jabura nor Kaku has the right key to open the handcuff. Thus, Zoro is forced to fight them both by using Usopp as his sword.

episodes.title: Seigyo Funou! Chopper Kindan no Rumble
episodes.description: Chopper struggles against Kumadori, and he has reached his limit in using Rumble Balls. But it is impossible for him to win without the power given by his Rumble Ball. So Chopper decides to use Rumble Balls once more and goes totally berserk.

episodes.title: Luffy Oyabun Futatabi! Yume ka Utsutsu ka Tomikuji Soudou
episodes.description: In Grand Jipangu in Edo period, a little girl named Rika takes care of an ill man whom she calls Tot-san. Assuming Rika as the daughter, Buggy the Clown kidnaps her. Luffy comes to rescue her.

episodes.title: The World Shakes! The Straw Hats' Hostage Situation
episodes.description: As the news about Garp and Luffy spreads, a mysterious earthquake suddenly shakes the entire world. Meanwhile, a huge Navy fleet led by Admiral Kizaru surrounds Egghead and listens in as York contacts Mary Geoise to negotiate a deal.

episodes.title: Completely Surrounded! The Operation to Escape Egghead
episodes.description: In the Labophase on Egghead, which is completely surrounded by the Navy, Luffy and the others devise a plan to escape the island. However, the Frontier Dome, the laser defense system, cannot be deactivated without York's secret passcode.

episodes.title: A Clash of Two Men's Determination! Kizaru and Sentomaru
episodes.description: Kizaru finally makes landfall on Egghead and Sentomaru, stands in his way. The two men who were once close now clash violently. Meanwhile, Luffy and the others try their best to move the Sunny to the back side of the island to escape.

episodes.title: Looming Despair! Admiral Kizaru's Depressing Mission
episodes.description: Kuma finally reaches Mary Geoise and keeps advancing even without free will or mind. But Fleet Admiral Akainu stands in his way. On Egghead, Kizaru enters the Labophase and delivers a powerful kick to Luffy who tries to stop him.

episodes.title: Luffy vs. Kizaru! A Fierce Kaleidoscopic Battle
episodes.description: A bizarre battle between Luffy and Kizaru heats up. Meanwhile, in the Fabiriophase, Bonney is all alone and being chased by the Navy soldiers. Dr. Vegapunk sees this and can't help but leave the Labophase to rescue her, risking his life.

episodes.title: The Nightmare Strikes - Warrior God of Science and Defense, Saint Saturn
episodes.description: Vegapunk successfully wrests back the Pacifistas from the Navy, but another party soon gains control of them. At the same time, Luffy, Zoro, and the others sense an unearthly presence just as a pentagram suddenly appears on Egghead.

episodes.title: Kuma's Past - Better Off Dead in This World
episodes.description: Bonney gets captured by St. Saturn, whose power keeps Sanji and Franky from saving her. In St. Saturn's clenched fist, she recalls the memories of her father, Kuma.

episodes.title: A History Erased! God Valley of Despair
episodes.description: The human hunt begins and the Celestial Dragons start chasing locals of God Valley and slaves for prizes. Ivankov and Ginny share with Kuma and the others their surprising plan to survive the game. Meanwhile, ships full of infamous pirates start arriving on the island one after another

episodes.title: A Fleeting Moment of Happiness - Kumachi and Ginny
episodes.description: Kuma and Ginny live peacefully in the Sorbet Kingdom eight years after God Valley. However, their new king is enslaving the poor. Kuma tries to free the captured but ends up being imprisoned. A familiar face comes to rescue him.

episodes.title: A Pledge to Ginny - Kuma Becomes a Father
episodes.description: Two years after Ginny was kidnapped, she returns to Sorbet Kingdom and contacts the Revolutionary Army before passing away from a disease. Kuma decides to raise her daughter Bonney, but years later, Bonney contracts the same symptoms.

episodes.title: Saving One's Daughter - The Noble "Pacifist" Kuma
episodes.description: By fighting off Bekori, Kuma is put on the wanted list and decides to travel around the world in search of a cure for Bonney's disease. He reunites with Dragon and learns about the Government's scientist who might be able to cure Bonney.

episodes.title: Cruel Fate - Kuma's Decision as a Father
episodes.description: Taking advantage of Kuma's love for Bonney, the World Government imposes three harsh conditions on him in exchange for her treatment. Kuma agrees and Bonney's treatment starts in tandem with the clone development.

episodes.title: To the Sea Where My Father is! The Future Bonney Chooses
episodes.description: Bonney has been waiting for a letter from her father Kuma who promised to write to her. But with no letters in sight, she turns nine and one day realizes her disease is cured. She then decides to go out to sea to search for her father.

episodes.title: Kuma's Life
episodes.description: Bonney sails out to sea in search of her father and rises to prominence. At the same time, Luffy makes his name by defeating the Arlong Pirates and declaring war against the World Government. Watching his actions, Kuma begins to hold a certain belief.

episodes.title: I'm Sorry, Dad - Bonney's Tears and Kuma's Fist
episodes.description: The present day on Egghead, Bonney is caught in St. Saturn's grasp, knowing he is responsible for her father's transformation into a cyborg. However, Saturn reveals an even more shocking truth that throws Bonney into despair.

episodes.title: Thank You, Dad - Bonney and Kuma's Warm Embrace
episodes.description: Kuma, battered and without free will, approaches Bonney. Overcome with emotion, she tells him she saw all his memories and learned everything that he did for her. Watching the scene, Vegapunk wonders what compelled Kuma to come to Egghead.

episodes.title: Destroy Future Island - The Buster Call is Invoked
episodes.description: As an order comes down to evacuate the island in preparation for bombardment, Navy soldiers rush to their ships. Meanwhile, Vegapunk pleads with Saturn to halt the attack, but Saturn refuses to listen.

episodes.title: An Admired Hero - The Warrior of Liberation Who Saves Bonney
episodes.description: Vegapunk reveals the secret he alone has been keeping regarding the Pacifistas. Meanwhile, Bonney, her back against the wall, hears a familiar rhythm. It's the rhythm that her father taught her along with the legend of the hero he admired.

episodes.title: Reliable Reinforcements! Dorry and Brogy Arrive!
episodes.description: The Giant Pirate Crew led by Dorry and Brogy arrive at Egghead, which deeply moves Usopp and the others. Zoro keeps fighting Rob Lucci and the Pacifistas continues to torment the Navy while Luffy shows Bonney how to throw a real punch.

episodes.title: Come in, World - Vegapunk's Message
episodes.description: Caribou begs Augur and Devon to let him meet Blackbeard. An order is given to the Navy vice admirals to kill Bonney in order to take back control over the Pacifistas. Sanji flees with the injured Vegapunk while Luffy holds St. Saturn back.

episodes.title: Vegapunk's Secret Plan -A Tense Worldwide Broadcast
episodes.description: Suddenly, Vegapunk's broadcast begins and the whole world is taken by surprise. As everyone rushes to set up Video Transponder Snails and screens to watch it, the Five Elders grow concerned and discuss countermeasures.

episodes.title: The Worst Nightmare - The Five Elders Come Together
episodes.description: Just like when St. Saturn emerged on Egghead, black lightning strikes and pentagrams appear again. The Pacifistas are rendered immobile by an unknown shadow. Meanwhile, as the time for the Straw Hats to evacuate the island is drawing near, the fight between Zoro and Lucci intensifies.

episodes.title: Fighting Together with Friends! Luffy and the Warriors of Elbaph
episodes.description: Dorry and Brogy finally reunite with Luffy. However, they are still facing St. Saturn and St. Warcury in their alternate forms. Dorry blows a horn to alert his people to prepare to escape, but St. Warcury unleashes a deafening roar.

episodes.title: An Imminent Threat - Stussy and Edison's Resolve
episodes.description: Egghead Island burns as explosions shake the ground. Vegapunk begs Saturn to stop, but he doesn't listen. The Straw Hats run for their lives while Kizaru blocks their escape, and something big starts moving in the sea nearby.

episodes.title: A Stunning Conclusion - Vegapunk's Great Prediction
episodes.description: Vegapunk delivers his shocking broadcast to the world, revealing a dire prediction that shakes the foundations of the World Government, as the Straw Hats and their allies fight desperately to ensure his message is heard.

episodes.title: The Lost History - Joyboy, The First Pirate
episodes.description: Vegapunk's revelation sends shockwaves around the world. St. Saturn abandons his fight with Nami and the others and rushes to stop the broadcast. Vegapunk goes on to expose another stunning truth, this time about Joyboy, the first pirate.

episodes.title: The Void Century - A Revelation About a Sinking World
episodes.description: Edison begs Stussy to escape, but she makes a request in exchange. Meanwhile, Vegapunk presents another astonishing disclosure about a past cataclysm and the Ancient Weapons that will challenge the beliefs of people everywhere.

episodes.title: Get the Ship Moving! The Iron Giant Activates!
episodes.description: Vegapunk's revelation shocks even Koby and his fellow SWORD members, leading them to discuss what to do next.

series.title: Task
series.description: In the working-class suburbs of Philadelphia, an FBI agent heads a task force to put an end to a string of violent robberies led by an unsuspected family man.

episodes.title: Crossings
episodes.description: Agent Brandis leads a new team investigating robberies while coping with personal loss. Robbie Prendergrast steals from drug dealers to support his family after his brother's death, until a tip goes wrong.

episodes.title: Family Statements
episodes.description: As Tom's family braces for an emotional court date, Robbie faces a dilemma, and Maeve makes a critical choice.

episodes.title: Nobody's Stronger Than Forgiveness
episodes.description: As Robbie and Cliff try to find a potential buyer, Tom and Grasso level with the Dark Hearts, and Aleah and Lizzie question Peaches' former coworkers. Later, a raid leads Tom to a shocking revelation.

episodes.title: All Roads
episodes.description: Tom doubts his Task Force's loyalty during operation prep. Robbie and Cliff plan their park meeting. Perry investigates the gang, finding startling info. Maeve questions Robbie's escape strategy.

episodes.title: Vagrants
episodes.description: With help from an eyewitness, Tom and his team inch closer to breaking the case. Perry pays Maeve a visit, while Robbie puts his plan in motion. Later, Tom follows a lead that takes him down a dangerous path.

episodes.title: Out Beyond Ideas of Wrongdoing and Rightdoing, There Is a River.
episodes.description: Multiple factions clash in a forest confrontation, sparking an intense battle that changes everything. Robbie and the opposing groups face off in a pivotal encounter with lasting impact.

episodes.title: A Still Small Voice
episodes.description: In the wake of the showdown, the now-disbanded Task Force members continue to seek answers. As the Dark Hearts mobilize to cover their tracks, a shocking revelation leads them to a final confrontation.

series.title: Takopi's Original Sin
series.genre: Adult Animation, Animation, Anime, Drama, Hand-Drawn Animtion, Psychological Drama, Sci-Fi
series.description: Takopi travels from his home of Happy Planet to spread happiness on Earth, but meets the unsmiling Shizuka. Her school friends and home life are causing her somber expression and pure hearted Takopi is determined to change things.

episodes.title: 2016-nen no kimi e
episodes.description: Shizuka lives a painful life until things start to take a sudden turn when she meets an alien named Takopi.

episodes.title: Takop no kysai
episodes.description: Takopi makes various attempts to help Shizuka, but things don't seem to work in his favor.

episodes.title: Takop no kokkai
episodes.description: Takopi realizes something important while covering up the crime with Shizuka and Naoki.

episodes.title: Azuma-kun no kyuusai
episodes.description: After a shocking incident, Azuma struggles with guilt and loyalty, while Shizuka calmly plans her next move. As tensions rise, cracks begin to show in their fragile relationship

episodes.title: 2022-nen no kimi e
episodes.description: Shizuka goes to Tokyo, and Takopi remembers something important.

episodes.title: 2016-nen no kimitachi e
episodes.description: Takopi makes an important decision that will save not only Shizuka but also Marina and Naoki.

series.title: My Hero Academia
series.genre: Action, Adventure, Animation, Anime, Fantasy, Hand-Drawn Animtion, Sci-Fi, Shonen, Superhero, Urban Adventure
series.description: A superhero-admiring boy enrolls in a prestigious hero academy and learns what it really means to be a hero, after the strongest superhero grants him his own powers.

episodes.title: Izuku Midoriya: Origin
episodes.description: Izuku Midoriya desperately wants to be a hero, but he is one of the few in his generation born without a Quirk. Will meeting the number one hero, All Might, change his fate?

episodes.title: What It Takes to Be a Hero
episodes.description: Izuku accidentally learns of All Might's secret, but there's trouble in town again before Izuku has time to process it. Will All Might be able to save the day again?

episodes.title: Roaring Muscles
episodes.description: All Might tells Izuku that he can become a hero, but does he really have what it takes to become one?

episodes.title: Start Line
episodes.description: At the entrance exam, Izuku falls behind as the other students defeat faux villains left and right. Will he be able to get enough points to pass?

episodes.title: What I Can Do for Now
episodes.description: It's Izuku's first day of high school, and he still can't control his new Quirk. Will he make it to the second day of school with his eccentric new teacher?

episodes.title: Rage, You Damn Nerd
episodes.description: Izuku somehow gets through his first day of school and falls into a regular schedule of classes and training at U.A. In their first class with All Might...

episodes.title: Deku vs. Kacchan
episodes.description: Izuku is up against Katsuki in their first class with All Might! Can he and Uraraka beat the villain team of Katsuki and Tenya before time runs out?

episodes.title: Bakugo's Start Line
episodes.description: After the combat training lesson, the students and All Might reflect on their matches as they think about their next steps.

episodes.title: Yeah, Just Do Your Best, Iida!
episodes.description: Class 1-A has to elect a class representative, and everyone wants the job! How will they choose? And what lies in wait for them at the next class?

episodes.title: Encounter with the Unknown
episodes.description: Villains have attacked USJ, and it's up to Class 1-A to stop them. What are the villains after? Will All Might be able to save the day again?

episodes.title: Game Over
episodes.description: The students of Class 1-A are up against the League of Villains. Will they survive long enough for help to arrive?

episodes.title: All Might
episodes.description: All Might has finally shown up, but will he be able to defeat Nomu and save the day?!

episodes.title: Upon Each of Their Hearts
episodes.description: As the battle at USJ winds down, Izuku and All Might think about its repercussions. Meanwhile, the villains slink home to plan their next move.

episodes.title: That's the Idea, Ochaco
episodes.description: As the students and teachers recover from the attack on USJ, Izuku learns why Ochaco wants to become a hero.

episodes.title: Roaring Sports Festival
episodes.description: The U.A. sports festival begins and all eyes are on the first years as they start their qualifying round-the obstacle course race.

episodes.title: In Their Own Quirky Ways
episodes.description: The first years try to stand out as they struggle to finish the obstacle course and qualify for a spot in the next round.

episodes.title: Strategy, Strategy, Strategy
episodes.description: Izuku's having trouble finding a team for the cavalry battle in the next round of the U.A. sports festival. Luckily, he has a plan.

episodes.title: Cavalry Battle Finale
episodes.description: Fighting it out in the second half of the cavalry battle, does Team Midoriya have what it takes to stay in the top four?

episodes.title: The Boy Born with Everything
episodes.description: Izuku learns more about Todoroki's past as the first-years head into the final round of the sports festival.

episodes.title: Victory or Defeat
episodes.description: Izuku is up against Shinso in the first match of the finals, but can he overcome Shinso's Quirk to advance to the next round?

episodes.title: Battle On, Challengers!
episodes.description: It's one match after another in the first round of the finals tournament. Who will advance to the second round?

episodes.title: Bakugo vs. Uraraka
episodes.description: Bakugo seems almost villainous when he's up against Uraraka, but she has a plan to keep it from being a one-sided match.

episodes.title: Shoto Todoroki: Origin
episodes.description: Izuku forces Todoroki to face his past and himself as they square off in the first match of the second round of the finals.

episodes.title: Fight On, Iida
episodes.description: It's time to see who will make it to the final showdown. Will Iida's Reciproburst be enough to beat Todoroki?

episodes.title: Todoroki vs. Bakugo
episodes.description: Todoroki and Bakugo, the two finalists, begin their fight with one another.

episodes.title: Time to Pick Some Names
episodes.description: Following their epic debut at the sports festival, it's time for the first-years to pick the most important part of their identities-their hero name!

episodes.title: Bizarre! Gran Torino Appears
episodes.description: The internships begin! While everyone adjusts to their new tasks, Izuku starts training with Gran Torino, the same man who once taught All Might.

episodes.title: Midoriya and Shigaraki
episodes.description: The U.A. students are finally starting to get the hang of their internships, but Izuku has much more to learn about One For All.

episodes.title: Hero Killer: Stain vs U.A. Students
episodes.description: Stain strikes again, and this time some U.A. students are around when it happens. Will they be able to hold him off until the pros come?

episodes.title: Climax
episodes.description: It all comes to a head as Izuku, Iida, and Todoroki face off against Stain while the pro heroes in Hosu City fight against the Nomus.

episodes.title: The Aftermath of Hero Killer: Stain
episodes.description: Stain is finally captured, but now the hero community must deal with the consequences of their actions.

episodes.title: Everyone's Internships
episodes.description: As Izuku, Iida, and Todoroki recover from their fight with Stain, the other members of Class 1-A work hard at their own internships.

episodes.title: Listen Up!! A Tale from the Past
episodes.description: The students return to their daily lives while All Might has a special history lesson for Izuku. It's time to learn about One For All!

episodes.title: Gear Up for Final Exams
episodes.description: Finals are coming up, and Class 1-A is going to need more than a cram session. This year, the teachers are changing the practical exams.

episodes.title: Yaoyorozu: Rising
episodes.description: The exams are turning out to be much more challenging than the students expected. Can any of the teams hold their own against a teacher?

episodes.title: Stripping the Varnish
episodes.description: As the students of Class 1-A fight in their practical exams, their resolve to become heroes is put to the test.

episodes.title: Katsuki Bakugo: Origin
episodes.description: Midoriya and Bakugo begin their match with All Might but the two of them have different plans.

episodes.title: Encounter
episodes.description: The league of villains has two people wanting to join them. UA students go to the mall. When they're at the mall everyone goes off on their own leaving Midoriya by himself where he encounters Tomura Shigaraki.

episodes.title: Game Start
episodes.description: A recap episode highlighting the first 2 seasons as Class-1A and Class-1B prepare to start summer camp.

episodes.title: Wild, Wild Pussycats
episodes.description: The kids arrive at camp, where they will be subjected to hard work like they've never experienced before.

episodes.title: Kota
episodes.description: Midoriya finds out more about Kota and why he feels so strongly about heroes as a small but competent group of villains threaten to endanger the lives of everyone in the camp.

episodes.title: My Hero
episodes.description: The villains launch their attack, and only Izuku knows where Kota is. Can he get to him in time?

episodes.title: Drive It Home, Iron Fist!!!
episodes.description: As the students and teachers retaliate against the villains, two students take it into their own hands to handle the unknown gas swirling across the forest.

episodes.title: Roaring Upheaval
episodes.description: The students and teachers of U.A. are still fighting in the woods, but has the Vanguard Action Squad accomplished its mission already...?.

episodes.title: What a Twist!
episodes.description: Todoroki, Kirishima, and Midoriya want to go after Bakugo, but the class rep is standing in their way. Meanwhile, Shigaraki makes Bakugo an offer...

episodes.title: From Iida to Midoriya
episodes.description: Todoroki, Kirishima, and Midoriya want to go after Bakugo, but the class rep is standing in their way. Meanwhile, Shigaraki makes Bakugo an offer...

episodes.title: All For One
episodes.description: The heroes and U.A. students close in on the League of Villains' hideouts, but the League still has an ace up its sleeve.

episodes.title: Symbol of Peace
episodes.description: As the fight against the League of Villains escalates, can the U.A. students get Bakugo out in time for All Might to make a big comeback?

episodes.title: One For All
episodes.description: All Might's time is running out as he faces his ultimate nemesis head on. Will he finally be able to defeat All For One once and for all?

episodes.title: End of the Beginning, Beginning of the End
episodes.description: Students and faculty react to the fallout of All Might and All for One's confrontation.

episodes.title: Moving into Dorms
episodes.description: The students of Class 1-A move into the dorms and have a competition to determine who has the best room as they settle in.

episodes.title: Create Those Ultimate Moves
episodes.description: Class 1-A works on developing their Quirks and creating ultimate moves in order to get ready for the provisional hero licensing exam.

episodes.title: The Test
episodes.description: Izuku and his classmates make some final adjustments to their ultimate moves and then head off to the provisional licensing exam.

episodes.title: Shiketsu High Lurking
episodes.description: The provisional licensing exam has begun, and everyone's after Class 1-A. Can they last long enough to pass this first test?

episodes.title: Class 1-A
episodes.description: Todoroki's on his own against Seijin High, and Yaoyorozu's group is pitted against Seiai Academy as they and the rest of Class 1-A fight to pass the first test.

episodes.title: RUSH!
episodes.description: It's down to the final minutes of the first test of the provisional licensing exam and almost half of Class A is still left.

episodes.title: Rescue Exercises
episodes.description: The second test of the provisional licensing exam has begun, and the hero candidates are suddenly thrust into a rescue operation.

episodes.title: Special Episode - Save the World with Love!
episodes.description: We take a break from the provisional licensing exam to visit a class held before the summer training camp.

episodes.title: What's the Big Idea?
episodes.description: The exam nears its end, but Izuku and the other hero candidates must fend off Gang Orca to finish the rescue mission.

episodes.title: A Talk about Your Quirk
episodes.description: While the U.A. students finish up the provisional licensing exam and get their results, All Might has a talk with All For One.

episodes.title: Deku vs. Kacchan, Part 2
episodes.description: Following the provisional licensing exam, Izuku tries out his Shoot Style on Bakugo as they have a heart-to-heart through their fight.

episodes.title: A Season for Encounters
episodes.description: The world has changed for villains and heroes alike in the weeks after All Might's fight with All For One, and the U.A. students start their second semester.

episodes.title: Unrivaled
episodes.description: The students of Class 1-A learn about work studies from the Big Three. Meanwhile, the villains also prepare their next steps.

episodes.title: The Scoop on U.A. Class 1-A
episodes.description: After All Might announces his retirement, freelance reporter Taneo Tokuda goes to the dorms to investigate U.A. Class 1-A.

episodes.title: Overhaul
episodes.description: Overhaul pays a visit to the League of Villains, and Midoriya tries to find a place to do his work study.

episodes.title: Boy Meets...
episodes.description: Izuku battles Sir Nighteye so he can do his work study at Nighteye's agency, but Nighteye has someone else in mind to be All Might's successor.

episodes.title: Fighting Fate
episodes.description: Izuku's mind is swirling with feelings from his work study, so he goes and talks to All Might about it and learns about All Might's fate.

episodes.title: Let's Go, Gutsy Red Riot
episodes.description: Kirishima begins his work study with Fat Gum and Amajiki and runs into a criminal situation. Meanwhile, Shigaraki and Overhaul meet up in order to discuss an alliance.

episodes.title: An Unpleasant Talk
episodes.description: The work study students from U.A. attend a meeting of heroes gathered by Sir Nighteye and leave with new resolve.

episodes.title: Go!!
episodes.description: The work study students wait until the pro heroes find Eri and it's time to start the operation to save her.

episodes.title: Suneater of the Big Three
episodes.description: The Shie Hassaikai is going all out to stop the heroes, and Suneater volunteers to take out the first batch of Eight Bullets members in their way.

episodes.title: Red Riot
episodes.description: As the fight with the Shie Hassaikai continues, Kirishima has to face his past when he and Fat Gum get separated from the others.

episodes.title: Temp Squad
episodes.description: The Hassaikai gets some help from the League of Villains as the heroes continue to make their way to Overhaul to rescue Eri.

episodes.title: Lemillion
episodes.description: The League of Villains stay true to their name in their fight. Meanwhile, Togata catches up to Overhaul and Eri first.

episodes.title: Unforeseen Hope
episodes.description: Izuku, Eraser Head, and Sir Nighteye finally reach the area where Overhaul and the others are and find Togata past his limit.

episodes.title: Infinite 100%
episodes.description: As the fight with the Shie Hassaikai reaches its climax, Overhaul looks back on how it all started, and Izuku uses All For One at 100%.

episodes.title: Bright Future
episodes.description: As the heroes deal with the aftermath of the fight with the Shie Hassaikai, the vehicle transporting Overhaul has an encounter with the League of Villains.

episodes.title: Smoldering Flames
episodes.description: After the fight with the Shie Hassaikai, a new villain emerges, and the students who participated reflect on their own roles as future heroes.

episodes.title: Win Those Kids' Hearts
episodes.description: Camie joins the provisional license training course and is added to the team working with the kids from Masegaki. Meanwhile, Endeavor has a serious talk with All Might.

episodes.title: Relief for License Trainees
episodes.description: The trainees bond with the precocious Masegaki kids and life at U.A. goes back to normal as autumn approaches, but Aoyama has been acting strangely.

episodes.title: School Festival
episodes.description: As the students of U.A prepare for their school festival, Deku and Togata visit Eri in the hospital. Meanwhile, a new villain named Gentle Criminal begins his reign of crime.

episodes.title: Prepping for the School Festival is the Funnest Part
episodes.description: As the date of the school festival draws nearer, Deku and the rest of Class 1-A decide who is going to do what in order to put on the greatest school festival ever.

episodes.title: Golden Tips Imperial
episodes.description: The day of the festival is at hand and Class 1-A is ready. As they relax on the night before, Gentle Criminal hatches his plan to infiltrate the festival, starting with a very special tea.

episodes.title: Deku vs. Gentle Criminal
episodes.description: While getting something for the festival, Deku runs into Gentle Criminal. Learning that he plans to infiltrate the festival, Deku begins to fight the mysterious villain and his partner La Brava.

episodes.title: School Festival Start!
episodes.description: Deku scrambles to stop Gentle Criminal from infiltrating U.A's school festival using his Shoot Style technique. As La Brava uses her Quirk to power up Gentle, his resolve hardens as he fights against Deku.

episodes.title: Let it Flow! School Festival!
episodes.description: Izuku rushes back to the school festival after his encounter with Gentle Criminal and La Brava, but will he make it in time for his performance?

episodes.title: Japanese Hero Billboard Chart
episodes.description: It's time for the next Japanese Hero Billboard Chart rankings to be announced, and this time, all the top ten heroes make an appearance.

episodes.title: His Start
episodes.description: Endeavor and Hawks continue to battle the mysterious Nomu enemy that attacked them. As they scramble to stop the villain and save the people, the whole world watches what the new "Symbol of Peace" is capable of.

episodes.title: All Hands on Deck! Class 1-A
episodes.description: The day after Endeavor's climatic battle, Izuku and his classmate take part in a combat training exercise.

episodes.title: Vestiges
episodes.description: Hawks reveals where his morals lie and Endeavour begins his journey to mend his relationship with his family.

episodes.title: Clash! Class A vs. Class B!
episodes.description: Class A and Class B are joined by a special guest as they battle it out during their joint combat training.

episodes.title: Make It Happen, Shinso!
episodes.description: The Class A team tries to put Shinso and his new equipment to good use in the first match against Class B.

episodes.title: Operation New Improv Moves
episodes.description: It's darkness versus darkness as Tokoyami and Kuroiro face off in the second match of the class battles.

episodes.title: Foresight
episodes.description: Separated from her team, Yaoyorozu's leadership skills are put to the test in the second match of the class battles.

episodes.title: Match 3
episodes.description: In the third match of the class battles, Honenuki leads the Class B team against a well-balanced Class A team.

episodes.title: Match 3 Conclusion
episodes.description: It's still anybody's game as the third match continues with an endurance battle between Todoroki and Tetsutetsu.

episodes.title: Early Bird!
episodes.description: Bakugo shows a different side of himself in the fourth team match as the class battles continue.

episodes.title: That Which Is Inherited
episodes.description: Midoriya and Shinso face off for the first time since the sports festival in the last fight of the class battles.

episodes.title: Our Brawl
episodes.description: It's an all-out brawl as the last two teams from Class A and Class B fight it out to the finish.

episodes.title: The New Power and All For One
episodes.description: As the class battles conclude, Midoriya works with All Might and Bakugo on learning more about his new power.

episodes.title: Have a Merry Christmas!
episodes.description: It's Christmas at U.A. and the Class 1-A students celebrate with a Christmas party.

episodes.title: Off to Endeavor's Agency!
episodes.description: Hawks acts strange when he meets Endeavor and his work study students on their way to Endeavor Agency.

episodes.title: One Thing at a Time
episodes.description: As the villains continue to move behind the scenes, Endeavor helps his work-study students with the next steps in their training.

episodes.title: Long Time No See, Selkie
episodes.description: Ryukyu brings her work study students with her when Selkie asks her to team up with him.

episodes.title: The Hellish Todoroki Family
episodes.description: Endeavor brings his work study students over for dinner at Fuyumi's request but faces awkward conversations at home.

episodes.title: The Unforgiven
episodes.description: One of Endeavor's biggest fans shows up to settle some unfinished business, and he expects far more than an autograph.

episodes.title: More of a Hero Than Anyone
episodes.description: When an unsettling discovery is made regarding Kurogiri, Aizawa and Present Mic are summoned to interrogate him.

episodes.title: My Villain Academia
episodes.description: A series of surprise encounters helps give Shigaraki a new sense of direction for the League of Villains.

episodes.title: Revival Party
episodes.description: The League of Villains waits for Gigantomachia to wake up as they clash with the Meta Liberation Army.

episodes.title: Sad Man's Parade
episodes.description: As Twice tries to save Toga, he thinks back on his past and makes a realization that helps him overcome it.

episodes.title: Tenko Shimura: Origin
episodes.description: As the battle between Shigaraki and Re-Destro rages on, Shigaraki begins to remember his past.

episodes.title: Tomura Shigaraki: Origin
episodes.description: Shigaraki remembers his first encounter with All For One during the climax of his battle with Re-Destro.

episodes.title: The High, Deep Blue Sky
episodes.description: Both sides prepare for the confrontation between the heroes and the Paranormal Liberation Front as Class 1-A finishes their first year of high school.

episodes.title: A Quiet Beginning
episodes.description: Using the information Hawks gathered, the heroes and their work study students get ready for an attack on the Paranormal Liberation Front led by Shigaraki.

episodes.title: Mirko, the No. 5 Hero
episodes.description: Mirko chases after Garaki while the rest of Team Endeavor deals with Nomus at Jaku Hospital. Meanwhile, Team Edge Shot charges in for a surprise attack at Gunga Villa.

episodes.title: One's Justice
episodes.description: Inside Gunga Villa, the Paranormal Liberation Front realizes that they are under attack, and Twice confronts Hawks about his betrayal.

episodes.title: Inheritance
episodes.description: Hawk's confrontation with Dabi leads him to think back in his past. Meanwhile, at the hospital, Mirko fights her way through multiple High Ends to get to Garaki and Shigaraki.

episodes.title: The Thrill of Destruction
episodes.description: After reinforcements finally arrive, the tide is just starting to turn in the heroes' favor when Shigaraki wakes up.

episodes.title: Encounter, Part 2
episodes.description: As Endeavor tells his team that he's fighting Shigaraki, Midoriya realizes that Shigaraki is after One For All and uses himself as bait to try to lure Shigaraki away from the civilians.

episodes.title: Disaster Walker
episodes.description: Team Endeavor is up against Shigaraki while Gigantomachia breaks through the heroes surrounding Gunga Villa and is headed toward Team Edge Shot's rear guard.

episodes.title: League of Villains Vs. U.A. Students
episodes.description: Led by Yaoyoruzu, the U.A. Class 1-A and 1-B work study students take on Gigantomachia as he heads their way with the League of Villains on his back.

episodes.title: Katsuki Bakugo: Rising
episodes.description: As Midoriya goes up against Shigaraki, Bakugo remembers a conversation he had with All Might when he was helping Midoriya train.

episodes.title: The Ones Within Us
episodes.description: Midoriya and Shigaraki enter the world of One For All as Gigantomachia continues north and Toga makes a detour.

episodes.title: Dabi's Dance
episodes.description: As Ochako and Toga exchange words and blows, Gigantomachia reaches Shigaraki and the heroes, and Dabi reveals the secret of his past.

episodes.title: Threads of Hope
episodes.description: Best Jeanist appears and spins together the hopes of all the heroes in this fight as the climax of the all-out war draws near.

episodes.title: Final Performance
episodes.description: Thinking of his great-great-grandfather, Mr. Compress performs his greatest trick in order to save the League of Villains.

episodes.title: Hellish Hell
episodes.description: The heroes wrestle with changing public opinion as they deal with the aftermath of the fierce battle and mourn those they lost in the fight.

episodes.title: Tartarus
episodes.description: Under All For One's control, Shigaraki attacks Tartarus with the Nomus to free All For One's body, freeing many other prisoners in the process.

episodes.title: The Hellish Todoroki Family, Part 2
episodes.description: As heroes deal with criticism from the public, Hawks thinks back on his past with his family, and Endeavor's family visits him in the hospital.

episodes.title: The Wrong Way to Put Out a Fire
episodes.description: Endeavor and his family reflect on Toya's past and the events that led to his death, and Hawks and Best Jeanist bring them a proposition.

episodes.title: Izuku Midoriya and Tomura Shigaraki
episodes.description: Inside One For All, Izuku talks with the past wielders as the top three heroes deal with public sentiment after Dabi's revelation.

episodes.title: Full Power!!
episodes.description: After Izuku decides not to go back to U.A., he finds himself facing Muscular, who was broken out of jail, again and uses the Quirks of the past wielders against him.

episodes.title: Hired Gun
episodes.description: The top three heroes continue to face criticism as they deal with jailbreakers and look for hints about All For One and Shigaraki's whereabouts, and Izuku comes across a villain from Tartarus.

episodes.title: The Lovely Lady Nagant
episodes.description: During Izuku's fight with Lady Nagant, she tells him secrets about hero society that further solidify his resolve to help those who need his help.

episodes.title: Friend
episodes.description: As Izuku goes off alone in his quest for justice, his classmates realize something is wrong and try to find a way to help him.

episodes.title: Deku vs. Class A
