episodes.description: Fierce high school rivals Umemiya and Tomiyama engage in a decisive one-on-one battle, with Tomiyama seeking to claim Furin High School, freedom, and an unparalleled sense of fun as the victor.

episodes.title: Dialogue
episodes.description: Admitting defeat, Tomiyama offers Shishitoren to Umemiya, who suggests being friends instead of taking over. Bofurin and Shishitoren are stunned but agree, sharing food and celebrating together.

episodes.title: New Classmates
episodes.description: After the battles against the Shishitoren, things start to calm down for Sakura and his friends. Upon returning to school, they meet Tsugeura, who invites them to talk at a restaurant. But suddenly a colleague arrives accompanied.

episodes.title: The Dependable One
episodes.description: Second-year students Ren, Yuto, and Takeshi from the Tamon Team hold a vote to decide the Grade Captain for first-year Class 1. Suo nominates Sakura, and the other classmates follow suit.

episodes.title: For A Friend
episodes.description: Sakura, Nirei, Suo conclude a gathering with Umemiya, the Four Kings, and other leaders. They reunite with Kiryu and Tsugeura for the journey back.

episodes.title: Rage
episodes.description: Bofurin sets out to find the KEEL gang's hideout to confront them and put an end to the Anzai problem. What they don't know is that they'll stumble into an unexpected trap.

episodes.title: Conclusion
episodes.description: At the warehouse, the battle between KEEL and Bofurin continues. Kaji prepares to fight Shingo, KEEL's leader, while the others, Sou, Taiga, Kiryuu, Sugishita, and Sakura, confront the boss's strongest henchmen.

episodes.title: Re:Start
episodes.description: Bofurin defeats KEEL members and saves Nagato. After explaining events to others, Sakura shares feelings as Nirei wakes up. Other students speak up while Kaji watches KEEL with a mysterious look.

episodes.title: Senpai's Teachings
episodes.description: After defeating KEEL, Sakura misses school with a bad cold. Nirei calls to check on him. Later, Nirei and Suo from class 1 visit his apartment with supplies, wondering about his out-of-town student life.

episodes.title: A Place I Belong
episodes.description: Sakura feels ineffective after fighting Keel. Seeking advice, Kaji tells him to trust based on experience while Umemiya urges him to give it his all. After recovering he faces his class ready to share his true feelings about being captain.

episodes.title: Hidden Feelings
episodes.description: Tsubakino guides Sakura, Nirei, and Suo to elderly Ito's residence.

episodes.title: Night Street
episodes.description: Tsubakino guides the boys through Keisei Street's neon district of bars and mahjong spots. As they go to meet him, a girl in torn white dress falls onto Sakura. Before they can talk, thugs appear.

episodes.title: Shared Frontlines
episodes.description: After helping Shizuka Narita, the group meets Roppo Ichiza, a team led by Kanji Nakamura who had a rivalry with Bofurin. At the Ougi Bar, where Kanji and Shizuka work, they see Tsubakino pole dancing.

episodes.title: Shall We Dance?
episodes.description: A group of criminals called GRAVEL wreaks havoc on Keisei Street looking for Shizuka. Roppo Ichiza and his allies confront them, but are outnumbered. Meanwhile, other members protect Shizuka at the OUGI Bar.

episodes.title: Salvation
episodes.description: Shizuka tries fleeing to GRAVEL's leader Suzuri, but Tsubakino and others stop her. After she declares wanting to stay, Tsubakino faces Suzuri seriously, their fight becoming a deeper exchange.

episodes.title: After the Storm
episodes.description: The group unites under Suzuri, choosing a new path with Roppo Ichiza. Shizuka apologizes to Tsubakino and Kanji. As everyone finds harmony, tattooed ex-Furin student Endo appears.

episodes.title: Strength for Another
episodes.description: Umemiya gathers Bofurin to warn of Yamato Endo's return. The episode highlights Endo's past, Umemiya's leadership, team unity, and Sakura's growth as they prepare together for the coming threat.

series.title: Tatsuki Fujimoto 17-26
series.genre: Adult Animation, Animation, Anime, Drama, Fantasy, Hand-Drawn Animtion, Japanese, Sci-Fi, Shonen
series.description: 8 short stories created by Tatsuki Fujimoto when he was 17 - 26 years old

episodes.title: A Couple Clucking Chickens Were Still Kickin' in the Schoolyard
episodes.description: Aliens conquered Earth in 2019, treating humans as food. Yuuto and Ami survive disguised as chickens until Youhei, an alien student opposed to human slaughter, discovers them and decides to help.

episodes.title: Sasaki wa Dangan o Tometa
episodes.description: A love-struck student miraculously stops a gunman's bullet and, claiming to be from the future, redirects the attacker's fate while quietly preserving his devotion to his teacher.

episodes.title: Ningyo Rhapsody
episodes.description: A lonely boy shelters a wounded mermaid, forms a bond, then frees her when others try to capture her - left with only her fading song.

episodes.title: Me ga Sameta Onna Shokogun
episodes.description: A boy wakes up as a girl, navigating school and family while learning empathy and self-discovery before the unexplained transformation ends.

episodes.title: Yogen no Nayuta
episodes.description: Nayuta, a girl feared for her mysterious powers, is protected by her brother Kenji; together they escape persecution, finding safety and understanding.

episodes.title: Imouto no Ane
episodes.description: Two sisters confront rivalry and misunderstandings, ultimately finding understanding and reconciling their bond.

featured.title: IT: Welcome to Derry
featured.description: In 1962, a couple with their son move to Derry, Maine just as a young boy disappears. With their arrival, very bad things begin to happen in the town.

featured.title: One Punch Man
featured.description: The story of Saitama, a hero that does it just for fun & can defeat his enemies with a single punch.

featured.title: My Hero Academia
featured.description: A superhero-admiring boy enrolls in a prestigious hero academy and learns what it really means to be a hero, after the strongest superhero grants him his own powers.

featured.title: Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Movie: Infinity Castle
featured.description: The Demon Slayer Corps are drawn into the Infinity Castle, where Tanjiro, Nezuko, and the Hashira face terrifying Upper Rank demons in a desperate fight as the final battle against Muzan Kibutsuji begins.

featured.title: How to Train Your Dragon
featured.description: As an ancient threat endangers both Vikings and dragons alike on the isle of Berk, the friendship between Hiccup, an inventive Viking, and Toothless, a Night Fury dragon, becomes the key to both species forging a new future together.

featured.title: Superman
featured.description: Superman must reconcile his alien Kryptonian heritage with his human upbringing as reporter Clark Kent. As the embodiment of truth, justice and the human way he soon finds himself in a world that views these as old-fashioned.
